hero.heading:
Combining Front-End
and Creativity
hero.paragraph: Hello! My name is <highlight>Dalvan Carvalho</highlight>, I'm a front-end developer focused on creating unique user experiences.
hero.bgAltText: Rectangles of several dimensions that compose the background of the main section of the page

about.heading: But... who am I?
about.paragraphI: I entered the world of front-end development about a year ago after transitioning from the field of <highlight>civil engineering</highlight>, in which I graduated. In the technology field, I found the opportunity to <highlight>reinvent</highlight> myself while continuing to do what I love most: creating things that reflect the standards I always strive to maintain, such as <highlight>attention to detail</highlight>, <highlight>quality</highlight>, and <highlight>organization</highlight>.
about.paragraphII: I love <highlight>researching and understanding how things work</highlight>. The countless possibilities of solving problems or implementing ideas through lines of code make it impossible for a day in front of the computer to go by without learning something new. If this process is accompanied by a good playlist, everything gets even better!
about.paragraphIII: When I'm not immersed inside VS Code, I usually engage in sports, hang out with friends, or simply spend some quality time by myself. I have also been investing the free time in my newest hobby: <highlight>board games</highlight>!
about.subHeadingIV: Recently, I've been working with the following technologies:
about.paragraphIV: Even coming from a different background, I had extensive contact with <highlight>relational database (PostgreSQL)</highlight> in my most recent professional experience. Additionally, I keep myself updated on all the benefits that <highlight>artificial intelligence</highlight> can offer.
about.tapeAltText: Image representing a piece of adhesive tape
about.hoverTextTitle: yep, it's a Super Mario reference üçÑ
about.stackAltText: Image composed by logos from technologies Dalvan works with

projects.heading: Handcrafted work
projects.paragraph: After some time learning the fundamentals of front-end development and venturing into tutorials for creating music players, <iss>ISS trackers</iss>, and three or four different types of to-do lists, I list below some personal projects that <highlight>truly made me learn JavaScript</highlight> and explore its potential in building web applications.

brGeo.altText: Screen of BR Geo, displaying a dashboard with a Rio de Janeiro map and populacional statistics in a chart on its side
brGeo.heading: BR Geo
brGeo.description: View information from several geographic and social topics through charts and interactive maps. With the powerful IBGE API, get updated data at county, state, and country levels!

personalWebsite.altText: Home screen from Dalvan Carvalho's personal website
personalWebsite.heading: Personal website
personalWebsite.description: That's right! This website deserves a place on the list for including several interesting features used in its development, such as libraries for routing, internationalization, e-mail sending, and animations.

splitIt.altText: Several expenses spreadsheets placed side by side and slightly rotated
splitIt.heading: Split it!
splitIt.description: Based on a spreadsheet for expenses control during a trip with friends, Split it! allows for a fair division of expenses among all group members in a simple and intuitive way!

contact.heading: Let's talk!
contact.paragraphI: <highlight>I'm very glad that you've taken the time to check out my personal website!</highlight> I hope you enjoyed browsing through my works and learning a bit more about what I do.
contact.paragraphII: Currently, <highlight>I am available to join a creative team of designers and developers</highlight>. If you think we can work together, please send a message to one of the contacts below or through the form in this section, and I promise to get back to you as soon as possible!

phone.href: https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=+5592985518435&text=Hello Dalvan! I found your website and would like to get in touch üòÉ

topics.heading: Professional information
topics.paragraph: You can explore the categories below to learn more about my skills and professional experiences. If you have any questions or would like to chat, please don't hesitate to <contact>get in touch!</contact>

companyIII.heading: dalvan c_
companyIII.bulletI: Manages <softHighlight>dalvanc.com</softHighlight>, sharing his journey in the field of front-end development and providing details about the projects undertaken, including the technologies employed in each.
companyIII.bulletII: Develops responsive websites and applications (compatible with mobile devices) using modern CSS frameworks and JavaScript libraries like <softHighlight>Tailwind CSS</softHighlight> and <softHighlight>React</softHighlight>.
companyIII.bulletIII: Stays updated with the latest trends and technologies in front-end development, following best practices and prioritizing the maintainability and scalability of applications.

companyII.heading: Topocart Engineering
companyII.subheading: may 2017 - aug 2022 ¬∑ SCS, RS / Manaus, AM
companyII.bulletI: Effectively led office teams in Manaus and Bras√≠lia (the latter remotely) for the successful execution of tasks in projects across different locations in the country, contributing to operational efficiency and goal achievement.
companyII.bulletII: Contributed to the growth and development of the office team, from the hiring process to continuous training and management, fostering a productive work environment.
companyII.bulletIII: Ensured stability and efficiency of the IT infrastructure in the Manaus office by leading the management and maintenance of workstations, servers, and storage in close collaboration with the company's IT team at the headquarters in Bras√≠lia, DF.

companyI.heading: IDB Inform√°tica
companyI.bulletI: Led the technical support department for over 5 years, excelling in providing remote and on-site technical support to end users. Additionally, trained new technicians and implemented methods for detecting and resolving issues at both software and hardware levels.
companyI.bulletII: Performed on-site maintenance and management of IT and network infrastructure for corporate clients, significantly optimizing issue resolution. Ensured personalized assistance, precisely aligned with the individual needs of each case, resulting in more efficient infrastructure management and lasting customer satisfaction.

download.heading: Get your PDF!
download.paragraph: You can download all the information listed above by clicking on the cards below. They are available in both <highlight>Portuguese and English</highlight>, and you can choose between <highlight>PDF or PNG</highlight> formats.
